short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance english article reading experience with speech, bilingual mode, and looking up dictionary.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
该扩展通过将任何网页转换为阅读模式，提供朗读、双语阅读、查词功能，并且支持历史文章回顾，让英语阅读变得轻松自如，是学习者的强大工具。文章内容在一个时尚的覆盖层中清晰显示，没有广告等干扰，而侧边栏提供详细的词汇信息。非常适合学生和语言爱好者，这个扩展使阅读和学习新词汇变得简单有趣。保持专注，提升词汇量，享受英文阅读起扩展带来的无缝阅读体验。
This Extension enhances your reading experience by transforming any webpage into reader mode, highlighting key vocabulary, and providing definitions, examples, and audio pronunciations. With features like bilingual mode for translations, on-click dictionary lookup, and text-to-speech for selected text, it’s a powerful tool for learners. Encapsulated in a stylish overlay, the main content is displayed clearly, free from distractions, while the sidebar offers detailed vocabulary insights. Perfect for students and language enthusiasts, this extension makes reading and learning new words easy and engaging. Stay focused, enhance your vocabulary, and enjoy a seamless reading experience with the English Reader extension.
